title: Provides that the social services district from which a recipient moved shall be responsible for his or her alcohol and drug addiction treatment for 180 days
summary: Provides that when a public assistance recipient, receiving care or treatment for alcohol or other drug addiction, moves from one social services district to another such district, the social services district from which the recipient moved shall remain responsible for such benefits for 180 days or until treatment is completed, whichever shall be sooner.
actClause: AN ACT to amend the social services law, in relation to responsibility for public assistance and care
